column4: I need help with help with GRUB, anyone here who can help with it? Would be very much appreciated.

Well the  thing is, I'm using one (1) Ubuntu 8.04 installation right now which is located at /dev/sda and in grub it's (hd1,0). The problem is I want to get my other installation working which is 8.04 too and it's located at /dev/sdb7, I can
't get it to boot from there
